chairman’s message

Jamal Majid Bin Thaniah CHAIRMAN- DUBAI TRADESHIELD
Jamal Majid Bin Thaniah is the Group Chief Executive Officer of Dubai World, one of the biggest holding companies in the world that manages and supervises a diversified portfolio of businesses in a variety of sectors, including
READ MORE

about us

The E-Services Excellence Award is an annual award ceremony organized by Dubai Trade in order to reward and recognize the best performers in e-Services adoption on the Dubai Trade portal. The ESEA features a new theme every year which targets a particular e-service with the main aim of encouraging the conversion to e-services, and award the highest performers.
READ MORE
